highlights.headline: Milwaukee Brewers vs. Texas Rangers: Game Highlights
highlights.description: Milwaukee Brewers vs. Texas Rangers: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Milwaukee Brewers vs. Texas Rangers: Game Highlights) 2025/09/10 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Jake Burger homered twice and the playoff-chasing Texas Rangers beat Milwaukee 6-3 on Wednesday to complete a three-game sweep of the Brewers, who still have the best record in the majors.
headlines.shortLinkText: Double Burger for Texas as big 1B homers twice in 6-3 win for 3-game sweep of MLB-best Brewers

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Boston Red Sox vs. Athletics: Game Highlights) 2025/09/10 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Nick Kurtz joined Jose Canseco and Mark McGwire as the only Athletics rookies to hit 30 home runs and Lawrence Butler hit a ninth-inning walk-off single in a 5-4 win Wednesday over the Boston Red Sox and Aroldis Chapman, whose seven-week hitless...
headlines.shortLinkText: Kurtz, Butler power A's past Red Sox 5-4, end Chapman's hitless streak of 50 batters, 17 appearances

headlines.description: — Eduardo Rodriguez allowed one hit over 6 1/3 innings and the Arizona Diamondbacks beat the San Francisco Giants 5-3 on Wednesday to avoid a series sweep.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rodriguez limits Giants to 1 hit over 6 1/3 innings in Diamondbacks' 5-3 victory

headlines.description: — Nick Loftin singled in the tying run and scored on Maikel Garcia’s double in the seventh inning, sending the Kansas City Royals to a 4-3 victory over the Cleveland Guardians on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Nick Loftin singles in tying run and scores in 7th, Royals rally for 4-3 win over Guardians

headlines.description: — Eric Wagaman hit a tiebreaking RBI single in the sixth inning, Xavier Edwards had a three-run homer among his three hits and Otto Lopez drove in two runs as the Miami Marlins overcame an early three-run deficit and beat the Washington Nationals 8-3...
headlines.shortLinkText: Wagaman, Edwards and Lopez power Marlins to a 8-3 comeback win over the Nationals

headlines.description: — Max Kepler homered and drove in five runs, Bryce Harper also went deep and the Philadelphia Phillies moved closer to repeating as NL East champions by routing the New York Mets 11-3 on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kepler powers Phillies past skidding Mets 11-3; magic number down to 7

events.name: Detroit Tigers at New York Yankees

highlights.description: Detroit Tigers vs. New York Yankees: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: COM_MLB Highlight (Detroit Tigers vs. New York Yankees: Game Highlights) 2025/09/10 ESHEET SOTFULL

headlines.description: — Gleyber Torres hit a go-ahead, two-run single in the fifth inning and had three RBI against his former team, leading the Detroit Tigers over New York 11-1 on Wednesday night for their first season-series win against the Yankees since 2011.
headlines.shortLinkText: Torres' 3 RBIs lead Tigers over Yankees 11-1 for 1st season-series win vs New York since 2011

headlines.description: — Yainer Diaz drilled a tiebreaking home run in the ninth inning, Carlos Correa hit his 200th career homer and the Houston Astros beat the Toronto Blue Jays 3-2 on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Carlos Correa hits 200th HR, Yainer Diaz adds winning shot as Astros beat Blue Jays 3-2

headlines.description: — Carson Kelly homered for the first of three runs against reigning NL Triple Crown winner Chris Sale and the Chicago Cubs outlasted the Atlanta Braves 3-2 on Wednesday to win the series.

headlines.description: — Elly De La Cruz and pinch-hitter Miguel Andujar delivered RBI singles in the eighth inning as the Cincinnati Reds beat the San Diego Padres 2-1 on Wednesday night to take two of three games in a series between National League playoff contenders.
headlines.shortLinkText: De La Cruz and Andujar lead late rally that gives the Reds a 2-1 win over the Padres
